contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Filmy dome spider | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Arthropoda]] | classis = [[Arachnida]] | ordo = [[Araneae]] | subordo = [[Araneomorphae]] | familia = [[Linyphiidae]] | genus = ''[[Neriene]]'' | species = '''''N. radiata''''' | binomial = ''Neriene radiata'' | binomial_authority = ([[Charles Athanase Walckenaer|Walckenaer]], 1842) }} The '''filmy dome spider''' (''Neriene radiata'' AKA '' Prolinyphia marginata'' and others in this genus) is a [[sheet weaver]]: a [[spider]] in the family [[Linyphiidae]]. These [[spiders]] construct a dome of fine [[silk]] and hang upside-down under it, waiting for their prey. Members of this genus include: <gallery> Image:Neriene.clathrata.jpg|Neriene clathrata Image:Neriene.emphana.female.jpg|Neriene emphana, female Image:Neriene.emphana.web.jpg|Neriene emphana web Image:Neriene.peltata.female.with.prey.jpg|Neriene peltata, female with prey Image:Neriene.peltata.male.jpg|Neriene peltata, male Image:Neriene.peltata.web.jpg|Neriene peltata web </gallery> {{DEFAULTSORT:Filmy Dome Spider}} [[Category:Linyphiidae]] {{spider-stub}}
